title: Arnett Cobb with the Red Garland Trio - 2001 - Sizzling & Bl
description:
Arnett Cobb with the Red Garland Trio - 2001 - Sizzling & Blue And Sentimental
Actually, these are two 1960 albums.

This CD reissue combines together tenor saxophonist Arnett Cobb's two LPs, Sizzlin' and Ballads by Cobb. The former session has a good mixture of stomps and ballads with highlights including "Black Velvet," "Georgia on My Mind," and "The Way You Look Tonight." The latter date (originally cut for the Moodsville label) is all slow ballads and, despite the warmth in Cobb's tone, a certain sameness pervades the performances. Pianist Red Garland and drummer J.C. Heard are on both sessions with either George Tucker or George Duvivier on bass. Good music but not quite essential. (AllMusic)

Track list:
01. Sweet Georgia Brown
02. Black Velvet
03. Blue Sermon
04. Georgia On My Mind
05. Sizzlin'
06. The Way You Look Tonight
07. Willow Weep For Me
08. Hurry Home
09. P.S. I Love You
10. Blue And Sentimental
11. Darn That Dream
12. Why Try To Change Me Now
13. Your Wonderful Love

Enjoy and share!
